name: Ringworld (Oculus Rift)
description:
This App is an artistic representation of the Ringworld, the megastructure imagined in Larry Niven's novel.

The 3D models are from Larry Niven´s Ringworld for Celestia (http://www.celestialmatters.org/users/rthorvald/ringworld/index.html). Their work and this App are licensed under an Attribution NonCommercial ShareAlike Creative Commons license. (CC BY-NC-SA)
